title: Fool's Gold (An Unabridged Production)[9-CD Set]; How the Bold Dream of a Small Tribe at J.P. Morgan Was Corrupted by Wall Street Greed and Unleashed a Catastrophe
description: From award-winning Financial Times journalist Gillian Tett, who enraged Wall Street leaders with her newsbreaking warnings of a credit crisis more than a year ahead of the curve, Fool's Gold tells the astonishing unknown story at the heart of the 2008 meltdown.
details: {"Item Weight": "3.53 Ounces", "Date First Available": "September 28, 2009", "Number of discs": "1"}
